cluster.name: Temperature Measurement
cluster.description: This cluster provides an interface to temperature measurement functionality, including configuration and provision of notifications of temperature measurements.

history.description: New data model format and notation

attributes.name: MeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the measured temperature. The null value indicates that the temperature is unknown.

attributes.name: MinMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the minimum value of MeasuredValue that is capable of being measured. The null value indicates that the value is not available.

attributes.name: MaxMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute indicates the maximum value of MeasuredValue that is capable of being measured. The null value indicates that the value is not available.
